subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2012)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Baylor star Brittney Griner said she would not play for the United States women’s basketball team at the London Games this summer, citing a family illness and her college schedule.
snippet: The Baylor star Brittney Griner said she would not play for the United States women’s basketball team at the London Games this summer, citing a family illness and her college schedule.
